title: Could anyone help me out?
content:
I know I'm asking a lot but I was wondering if anyone knew what fonts were used for the "Darlings", the second line of "Throw on your" and the "Celebrating". I know there is the Engravers font in there but not sure of the other ones. I have tried my best to find the fonts but am truly overwhelmed.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112923im_/http:/typophile.com/files/invite_4034.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [invite.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112923/http:/typophile.com/files/invite_6.jpg) | 71.14 KB |
author: donna9199

comments.content: Sorry, don't know any of the answers but, for the time being, here are some I like for "Darlings", somehow similar: [Champion Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112923/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-champion-script-pro), [Bickham Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112923/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm), [Bodoni Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112923/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-bodoni-script-pro), [Penabico](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112923/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/penabico)
